LanguageData.AA_ExtractUranium.label: process uranium crystals
LanguageData.AA_ExtractUranium.jobString: Extracting useful materials from unrefined uranium crystals.
LanguageData.AA_BlueGel_To_Hexagel.label: Compress blue gel to hexagel.
LanguageData.AA_BlueGel_To_Hexagel.description: Make a crystallized cube of hexagel by compressing blue gel under high pressure.
LanguageData.AA_Make_HexagelCore.label: Make hexagel cores.
LanguageData.AA_Make_HexagelCore.description: Craft hexagel cores using hexagel and uranium as a stabalizer.
LanguageData.AA_InstallMutantLeg.label: install mutant leg
LanguageData.AA_InstallMutantArm.label: install mutant arm
LanguageData.AA_InstallMutantEye.label: install mutant eye
LanguageData.AA_ShutDownMechanoid.label: shut down
LanguageData.RB_MakeSynthreadCloth.label: weave eleven synthread cloth from silk
LanguageData.RB_MakeSynthreadCloth.description: weave synthread cloth from Synthread Silk and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 11 cloth.
LanguageData.RB_MakeHyperweaveCloth.label: weave fifteen hyperweave cloth from silk
LanguageData.RB_MakeHyperweaveCloth.description: weave hyperweave cloth from hyperweave Silk and plasteel thread. \n\nMakes 15 cloth.
LanguageData.AA_MakeRangedSpinneretImplant.label: make a ranged spinneret implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeRangedSpinneretImplant.descriptio: Make a ranged spinneret implant from a Feralisk, Dunealisk, Blizzarisk, Cinderlisk, Junglelisk or Animalisk corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_MakeVenomousSpitterImplant.label: make a venomous spitter implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeVenomousSpitterImplant.descriptio: Make a venomous spitter from a Black Spelopede or Blackspider corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_MakeAcidicSpitterImplant.label: make an acidic spitter implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeAcidicSpitterImplant.description: Make an acidic spitter from a Red Goo, Green Goo, Mantrap, Red Spore or Ocular Jelly corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acidic spit attack that causes additional damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has an acidic spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_MakeBarbedQuillThrowerImplant.label: make a barbed quill thrower implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeBarbedQuillThrowerImplant.descrip: Make a barbed quill thrower implant from a Barbslinger, Nightling, Night Ave, Needleroll or Needlepost corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous quill attack that causes toxic buildup.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a barbed quill thrower will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_MakeQuadTeslaCannonImplant.label: make a quad tesla cannon implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeQuadTeslaCannonImplant.descriptio: Make a quad tesla cannon implant from a Tetra slug corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_MakeBioelectricOrganImplant.label: make a bioelectric organ implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeBioelectricOrganImplant.descripti: Make a bioelectric organ implant from a Thunderbeast corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_MakeLightFocusingLensImplant.label: make a light focusing lens implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeLightFocusingLensImplant.descript: Make a light focusing lens implant from a Crystalline Caracal corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect. This implant takes the space of one of the creature's eyes, so it can't be installed in eyeless animals.
LanguageData.AA_MakeHyperAcidicStomachImplant.label: make a hyper acidic stomach implant
LanguageData.AA_MakeHyperAcidicStomachImplant.descrip: Make a hyper acidic stomach implant from an Erin corpse. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged acid attack that causes damage over time.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a hyper acidic stomach will have no effect. This implant takes the space of the creature's stomach, so it can't be installed in animals that lack one.
LanguageData.AB_InstallSimpleTentacle.label: install simple prosthetic tentacle
LanguageData.AB_InstallBionicTentacle.label: install bionic tentacle
LanguageData.AA_InstallSimpleBeak.label: install simple prosthetic beak
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicBeak.label: install bionic beak
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicMotionDetector.label: install bionic motion detector
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicMotionDetector.descripti: Installs bionic motion detector. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
LanguageData.AB_InstallSimpleBuoyancy.label: install simple buoyancy mechanism
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicBuoyancy.label: install bionic buoyancy mechanism
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicBuoyancy.description: Installs bionic buoyancy mechanism. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
LanguageData.AB_InstallSimpleShell.label: install simple prosthetic shell
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicShell.label: install bionic shell
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicShell.description: Installs bionic shell. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
LanguageData.AB_InstallSimpleWing.label: install simple prosthetic wing
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicWing.label: install bionic wing
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicWing.description: Installs bionic wing. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
LanguageData.AB_InstallSimpleClaw.label: install simple prosthetic claw
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicClaw.label: install bionic claw
LanguageData.AA_InstallBionicClaw.description: Installs bionic claw. Requires a min skill in medicine of 8.
LanguageData.AA_InstallGooAcidifier.label: install goo acidifier
LanguageData.AA_InstallRangedSpinneretImplant.label: install ranged spinneret implant
LanguageData.AA_InstallRangedSpinneretImplant.descrip: Install a ranged spinneret. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged stunning web attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a ranged spinneret will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_RemoveRangedSpinneretImplant.label: remove ranged spinneret implant
LanguageData.AA_InstallVenomousSpitterImplant.label: install venomous spitter implant
LanguageData.AA_InstallVenomousSpitterImplant.descrip: Install a venomous spitter. This implant will allow this creature to use a ranged venomous spit attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a venomous spitter will have no effect. This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_RemoveVenomousSpitterImplant.label: remove venomous spitter implant

This implant can only be used by animals that have a mouth (and not, for example, a beak or proboscis).
LanguageData.AA_RemoveAcidicSpitterImplant.label: remove acidic spitter implant

LanguageData.AA_RemoveBarbedQuillThrowerImplant.label: remove barbed quill thrower implant

LanguageData.AA_InstallQuadTeslaCannonImplant.descrip: Install a quad tesla cannon. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged plasma attack.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a quad tesla cannon will have no effect.

LanguageData.AA_InstallBioelectricOrganImplant.descri: Install a bioelectric organ. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged electric attack that may paralyze and cause heart attacks.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a bioelectric organ will have no effect.
LanguageData.AA_RemoveBioelectricOrganImplant.label: remove bioelectric organ implant

LanguageData.AA_InstallLightFocusingLensImplant.descr: Install a light focusing lens. This implant will allow this creature to use a powerful ranged laser attack that sets enemies on fire.\n\nNote that installing this on a creature that already has a light focusing lens will have no effect.
